Suddenly, the one with the largest features said "we all want to bear your children in the near future, Shanihaka!" you blushed and told them, "ladies, please! You'll get your chance soon enough! Jus let me get to know you all first!" They all giggled and one of the nagas said "Sire, as Shanihaka, you are obliged to help the island to produce more children; both human and naga, to repopulate the land. The Voothroun clan decimated our peoples, and you put an end to their reign of terror. We are just a few of the matriarchs of the island, and we offer you our bodies as thanks for all that you've done." it made sense to you now. Not only would the Shanihaka remove any threats, but would also restore the villages hurt by those who would harm them. Your work wasn't done yet, so you nodded at their request. They squealed, stripped you of all of your garments, and started showing their affection in sensual kisses. Another warrior saw the mass around you and asked "My lord, is there an issue here, or can I be of any assistance to you?" You smiled and said "can you help me get these beautiful ladies to the palace?" He bowed, smiled and said "as you wish, my lord. It shall be done." the guard led you to your home and you saw it went through significant changes in the few hours you were out. Sonya saw you and said "Mom, looks like my boyfriend is a real ladies man! *giggle*" Zuriella smiled and said "Sonya told me you took good care of her and sweet Madoka while i was at the temple, praying for your arrival. Are you finally understanding your role as the king of the island, your highness?" you smiled back and said "I never knew repopulation was part of the job description!" Sonya giggled again and said "Mom told me and Maddy. Don't worry, darling! Maddy and I will allow it! Besides, your friends seem happy!" you felt she only meant the girls, but she also was talking about your member, which swelled as the matriarchs all squeezed you tightly and kissed your head passionately. You smile and say, "well c'mon! Let's see our new home!" Madoka smiled wide, giggled and whispered this in your ear, I have a cute naga on my back, who wants to eat you up!" you patted the new girl's head, and the 25 of you entered and seeing...
12411111211121121.title: A Family Reunion, The New Village & Your New Life

choices: Zuriella; her tail is larger, and she ate more, so it should feel nice in her
Sonya; I've kept her belly waiting long enough
124111112111211211.content:
As you and your new friends enter the house, you are in awe by how much the workers have done, there were statues of the naga gods and deities, as well as pottery, sculptures and paintings that could rival many human works of art, beautiful tapestries that were nothing short of gorgeous, and even a painting of Ophilia holding you like a child in her arms. You were nearly speechless, but said "This palace is fit for a pharaoh!" Zuriella had to ask the inevitable. "A pharaoh? This is for the Shanihaka. The chosen child of Ophilia! What's a pharaoh?" You smiled and said, "many millennia ago, a desert kingdom in a far away land chose the high priest of the gods as pharaoh; their king and master. His subjects believed that the pharaoh was a god incarnate; a deity, so few dared to question his orders." Zuriella finally understood what you meant, and could easily compare the pharaohs to the Shanihaka. "I understand it all now, your highness!" Zuriella hugged you with a bare bosom, and nuzzled you. Blushing, you try to keep focused on the beauty of your new home.

         in a mere 45 minutes you've seen your entire house refurbished with more space than the White House, Buckingham Palace and the Kremlin combined! many of the rooms were similar to a museum, but there were also a few war and map rooms (as a King does have to defend his lands). Leandros suddenly appeared at the palace gates and said "My Lord, when you have some time, there is a matter that needs to be dealt with!" You already saw your whole house and headed for the gates. when you got there, you saw four very young naga girls, crying so much, that it made you sad. you put your hands on one of the children's shoulders and asked "Why so sad, little ones?" one of the children (with pink scales and ruby hair) said "Pirates took our homes, our mommies and daddies away from us, my king! We have no family left!" she cried into your chest as you understood that there are still threats. You patted her head, and she looked up into your eyes. you smiled and said "You have a family, my family will welcome you. ALL of you." She smiled and told the others "Girls! We get to have a family again!" Three of them squealed and tackled you (the fourth was too shy and frightened to do the same), hugging you tight, before the pink scaled naga said "Thank you so much! we love you, Daddy!" the three of them nuzzled you as they show their gratitude for you adopting them. Leandros saw it all happening and said "that takes care of that issue! my lord is much nicer than i originally thought. but now that we have a pirate problem on our hands, we need to be ready."

         as you were hugging your new daughters, a strange kitten came to you and started to rub against your leg. You looked down and saw the kitten's fur was pitch black. You bent down to pick the little fella up, and it didn't resist! In fact, it licked your hand and walked into your grasp.  "Hey there little guy!" was all you said to the kitten, before it started to purr. You knew that panthers don't purr, so what was it? Your new daughters took a look at what you had before cheering "KITTY!" the kitten meowed at the girls as they started stroking it's fur and petting it's head. You were unsure about what type it was, but Leandros came over to you and said "That creature you picked up was a Gattan Panther. and it really took a liking to you. And i could tell you're not from here, as they are a naga's best friend, much like a dog in the lands far away. everyone on the island wants one, playful as a kitten around people all the time, and very ferocious when it sees it's owner in danger." You were a little unsure of the cat being a panther, so you asked "Is this island the only place you can find these creatures? and i didn't know panthers could purr or meow. "Leandros smiled and said "my lord, there are many things about this place that humans don't know about. but there is little we nagas don't know about your world. based on what i learned from foreign hunters, what you call the cougar, is the largest cat that can purr. well, they haven't seen that little fur ball!' you look back at your new daughters and see your Gattan kitten playing with their long hair like strings. You smile and told Leandros "We have a pirate problem, Captain, so i wish to see coastal watchtowers and troops ready to meet the pirates once spotted!" Leandros salutes you and goes to get the guards ready.

{indent)you walk over to the four children, and they introduce themselves to you. the pink scaled one hugged you and started "Daddy, we forgot to tell you our names! I'm Kiki." a green haired naga playfully bit your shoulder (she was too young to produce venom yet) "the one trying to eat you is Molly." it was so cute to you, that you pat Molly's head and stroke her hair. She giggled, and kissed your cheek. There were two others there, a blue haired one and a raven haired, pale naga. The blue one clung onto your leg and hugged it like a tree trunk, while the pale one tried to hide from you. The blue one said "I'm Elle, but you can call me Ellie if you want to. I'll let you, daddy!" you put your hand on Elle's head and she kissed your stomach. Suddenly, you looked at the shy one, and she quickly ducked her head behind a tree. You tried to get her to come out. "It's okay, my child! I'm not gonna hurt you! Just come here and let daddy give you a hug!" she slowly came out of hiding and slithered over to you. She reluctantly opened her arms, and you gently wrapped yours around her. The shy naga started to cry into your chest, when you asked "what's wrong, my child? You can tell me!" She wiped her tear away and said "no one has ever given me a hug, because no one ever made me feel loved! You have no clue what this means to me, daddy. I would tell you my name, but I don't have one!" she started to cry again, when you smile and say, "Would it be okay if I name you Belladonna? If you want, I can just call you Bella!" She wiped her tears away and said "Bella sounds pretty, daddy." you chuckle and say "in a far off land, Bella means 'beautiful.' I give you that name for what you are; beautiful!" Bella nodded and hugged you tight. She rests her chin on your shoulder, and whispers "thank you, daddy. I love you!" you smile and say "Let's not forget our other family member; little 'Shadow' here!"you pick up the purring panther kitten, who rubs it's head on Bella's cheek. Bella plays with the kitten a little, and you say "let's get inside, girls! It's getting dark out." the four of them nod with a smile, and Shadow rests on your shoulder as if it was a kitty saddle. The six of you get inside, and see that Sonya, Madoka and Zuriella were smiling, and Zuriella said "welcome to the family, you four! Now get washed up and ready for bed! We have a big day ahead of us tomorrow!" Kiki smiled and said "Okay nana! We'll get on it!" And the four of them headed for the master bathrooms. You smiled and asked "speaking of which, where's my bed?" Sonya and Madoka giggled, pointed at their snake halves and said "Right here, of course! We agreed to make our stomachs your bed, as you love it in our tummies! However, which one of us you sleep in will be up to you! But there is a catch, it has to be a different tummy every night." So Madoka said "Which means I'm out for tonight!" she giggles and kisses your lips before heading to her and Sonya's room! You understand it perfectly and after minutes of intense thought, you say "I think I'll sleep in _______'s belly tonight!"
124111112111211211.title: The New Palace (Adopting Kids and A Cute Kitten)

choices: Our game sounds good, as I hear that some pirates were given to you today
Let's do whatever we want to today; let's have a date too!
1241111121112112111.content:
Sonya blushed as you chose to sleep in her mom's stomach tonight, and Zuriella smiled, saying "Sonya, you might want to get to bed, I think Maddy's waiting for you!" Sonya gasped at her mother's words, and headed for her and Madoka's room. you smiled at how cute Sonya is when she blushed, and when the door closed, you heard faint moaning as the two friends started their fun tonight Zuriella picked you up from behind. She licked her lips and said "I only dreamed that this day would come. Bon appetit!" she opened her mouth wide and was about to swallow you, when suddenly, the children's bedroom door swiftly opened and out came a crying Bella.

         She bolted for you sobbing, and clung tightly to you. "She must have had a nightmare," you thought, and while Bella cried ito your chest, you pat her head and try to comfort her. "there, there, my child. I'm here for you!" She cried louder and said "But daddy, you weren't there! not when the scary people were trying to get me! they looked like humans but had parts missing, and bones showing! just like my real papa warned me about! He said they're gonna get me! DON'T LET THEM GET ME DADDY!" She cried louder into your arms, and this made you feel like weeping. but then you remembered from video games in the modern world how to kill a zombie (the monsters that terrorized Bella's dream). "I can tell you how to stop those monsters good, if you want. i memorized the trick in my travels before i found my calling!" Bella stopped crying for a little bit, and asked "how do you stop them, Daddy?" you smile and say "well there are two ways, actually. the first is silly. you point at the thing, say something in a shout, and a magical flying object knocks them down, my magic word 'Finland' and the flying thing is a big fish with wings and big beaver teeth." Bella started to giggle at the thought (your real word was Hax! and the object was a monitor for a PC, but she was young, and wouldn't know what that thing was until much later in her life) and you continued. "but sometimes i like to hit them fast and hard; give the monsters a spanking, so i imagine this..." you point at a gun mounted on the wall that nagas prize as a divine weapon, while humans can get it pretty much anywhere (a .30-06 rifle). Bella nods, and you say "and there are two ways of spanking them. one is using that large wooden part and hit them on the head. and the other is to use a little 'magic arrow,' point it at the head and let 'em have it." Bella seemed confused and asked "Why the head, and not anywhere else?" You chuckle and say "on a zombie, you gotta aim for the head; that's where the pudding is!" Bella's sadness turned into humor, as she's never heard that before. but as funny as your advice sounded, she had to ask "are the mean people in my bad dreams zombies, daddy?" you nod at her and say "yeah, they are, but don't worry. if you get scared, think of me and i'll be at your side! i promise you!" Bella felt much better now, as you saw her smiling at you. you were expecting her to head back to bed, but you heard her say "can i be in your bed tonight, daddy? I just want to be sure what you told me works, if that's okay." you blush at how cute Bella is in her curiosity and smile (hence that's why you named her that).

         You were about to speak, but Zuriella cut you off, saying "Tonight, your daddy's bed is in my tummy. And tomorrow, he gets to chose between your Aunt Sonya or Auntie Madoka! You can sleep beside my belly tonight, if you want to be by daddy, Bella." Bella was scared, and said "Please, nana! Don't eat daddy! He's not food!" you smile, pat her head and tell her "What nana is doing is showing me how much she likes me. Older naga girls eat humans they really like; not to treat them as food, but to say they love the human." Bella understood it all (to an extent) and asks "so daddy, if I eat a human boy or girl I really like, they won't be hurt?" you shake your head and say "oh no, my child. The human you eat that you like as a friend will be fine. In fact the human really likes the feeling in the naga's tummy after she eats him or her that way. To the human, it feels warm and tingly in there; like the naga's belly is hugging and tickling them!" Bella calmed down a little and she asks "could I do that to you if I was bigger, daddy?" You chuckle and say "Sure, my child. Now, you better get ready for bed with nana and me." She nods, hugs you tight and kisses your face several times before going into the children's bedroom to get her doll. You smile at how you handled that situation.  Zuriella made her move, and swallowed you quickly. Bella got her doll and slithered out to see her nana licking her lips and rubbing her full snake tummy, but wasn't scared after all you told her tonight. Bella goes over to her full nana and hugs her belly. Obviously happy, Bella giggles at the bulge you make in Zuriella's gut and says "Good night Daddy," before rapidly falling asleep.

         Zuriella moved quickly but carefully to her bedroom (as to not wake young Bella up). when she got you three in her bed, Zuriella wrapped her tail in a broad ring, brought the afghans up to Bella's shoulders, placed left hand on her human belly and her right around Bella. She then closed her eyes and started snoring. As usual, Zuriella's stomach started up after falling asleep, and her embrace began. To your surprise, Zuriella's body was warmer on the inside than Sonya (who was so warm inside that it was a Sunless summer day in the young woman's belly), and you quickly felt drowsy. You were about to fall asleep, when Zuriella's AA (acidic aphrodisiac) came in. The acid was strong, but still too weak to digest you and had less of a sensation than playful Madoka's stomach. Despite your disappointment, the warmth made up for the lesser tingle. The churning around you violently spread the acid all around your body, before Zuriella's rugae (stomach walls) started slowing down to a decent-sized rippling. You would have moaned if you were awake, but the warmth swiftly took your consciousness, and you were in a dream with Bella. You started fighting zombies with her, where you used Hax in your dream (in Bella's dream, you used what you told her) to beat the bone monkeys up. In her dream she says Moon-key-rah! and a silly looking troll in a tutu starts dancing, causing the zombies to explode in colors and confetti. Whereas in your dream, she used Jim Carrey's "most annoying sound in the world," and released two streams of bullets from her hands like vulcans (I guarantee you can find where I got my ideas for the attacks in your dream from DasBoSchitt's Gmod Idiot Box series on YouTube). Tonight's dream wasn't as erotic as it was deeply amusing to you, but you still release some sperm into Zuriella's belly. The three of you were happy tonight and when morning came, you were woken up by Madoka's kisses and cuddling. Madoka giggled and said "Today, you're all mine, baby!" you were confused, as Sonya usually woke you up. Madoka smiled playfully and said "your buddy Okonga confessed his love for Sonya when we woke up! Right now they're on a 'date' as you humans call it. and in case you were wondering, Sonya's mom is teaching the kids about a whole lot of human stuff." you smile as thats one less burden to be dealt with (not that you mind the children's company). She sees your delight and asks her big question of the day. "So whatcha wanna do today, cutie? Play our game again and 'have some fun' before i put you in my tummy again? Or was there something else on your mind?" she twirls her fingers around your crotch innocently, before telling you "it's all up to you, cutie!" smiling back at innocent Madoka, you answer...
1241111121112112111.title: Belly for a Bed (Bella at your Bedside)

choices: The hunt (reserved)
The hunt
12411111211121121111.content:
After much thought, you answer "I feel like playing our game again, Madoka! after all, i hear a bit of commotion in your bag!"
Madoka giggles and says "that's not my bag, that's my tummy! i... kinda had a few as a snack. but there were lots leftover after i ate! Mikki has the others, and she's 'getting them into character.' Hey, darling? do you think little Shadow should play too?"
you gasp at the thought, but regain your composure and say "Let's see how he reacts to me in a mouse costume compared to the others!" Nodding, Madoka gives you the mouse hat and whiskers before nipping you with her right fang (causing you to shrink). you then squeak to get Shadow's attention, and the kitten runs over to you and Madoka. Shadow then looks up at the two of you, purring eagerly.
She giggles and says "Oh! i have one of Mikki's mice right here to test this!" she pulls out a pirate "mouse" and puts him on the the ground. Shadow looks at the pirate (who was whimpering because of his current state), then meows at it, before creeping to it. Shadow then pounces on the pirate and gobbles him up, swallowing him whole and alive.
"Not really a surprise!" you think, and tell Madoka "i hope he knows the difference!"
Madoka smiles and says "Don't worry, darling! he won't eat his sweet owner, no matter how tasty you look to him! The pretty kitty'll know it's you!" you say a little prayer should something go awry, and Madoka puts you on the ground. You close your eyes for three minutes in fear, expecting that the kitten won't know, and that natural instinct will kick in. but when you open your eyes, you see Shadow is purring in front of you, and his head on the ground. he then slowly creeps to you, and rubs against your body, playfully. "he knows it's me!" you think in a surprised thought.
Madoka giggles and you finally say it "You're right, Maddy! He does know the difference!" Madoka cheers and you pet Shadow. He began licking his paw from his breakfast, when you got beside him, and started to pet his head and scratch behind his ears. Shadow was purring and meowing in a degree that you never thought possible, and Madoka went to get Mikan, giggling at how cute you and Shadow were.

         Madoka headed for her sister, who was done making the mice and was looking out the window at Zuriella and the kids. Madoka smiled and innocently asked "Hey Mikki! Whatcha doing?"
Mikan looked at little Madoka and said "Shhh! They're doing something really strange with those wooden arms, the bucket and the twisted rope (a torsion-powered ballista). But what I wanna know is what those things are on Bella's back and head (a parachute and helmet)?"
Madoka looked out the window and heard Bella say "I THINK THIS IS A BAD IDEA!"
Zuriella then says "Fire!" the arms went up and launched Bella into the air. She screamed for a couple seconds as she was shot straight up, but as she started falling back down, Bella pulled the string on her backpack and a parachute stopped her from falling too fast and hurting her tail. As she slowly came to the ground, she said "Hey, I'm flying!" she was laughing after this realization until she landed safely on the ground. Ellie was scared for her new sister and asked "Bella! Are you okay?"
An excited Bella cheerfully shouted "WHOO HOO! THAT WAS FUN! I WANNA DO IT AGAIN!"
Zuriella laughed and said "That is how a naga can fly without wings! Well, ONE way, anyway! Now, what are you kids all interested in doing now? Is everyone happy with this science stuff? Or would you like to read these strange stories that humans from distant lands like a lot (what we'd consider historic literary masterpieces; Tolstoy, Hemingway, Poe, Steinbeck, Dostoyevsky, Pushkin, Gogol, H.P. Lovecraft, Melville, Faulkner, Ayn Rand, Sophocles, Shakespeare, Homer, {Leandros snuck away with Sun Tzu for his drills and recruits for your guards, and replaced it with Lewis Carroll and a lot of mythology} Aristotle, Kafka, etc.), because they look quite interesting, wouldn't you agree? Anyone can do what they want from those choices in my classroom here!" (Zuriella got a bunch of books on math, science and the arts from Leandros' spoils of war last night, so they all have a taste of what they're gonna do before they do it, as well as a few how-to guides for science enthusiasts (Bella was all over those, even before she tried flying!)) the decision was half and half (Molly and Kiki wanted to read the stories, as they were fond of stories from their first year after hatching). No matter what Mikan was trying to make out of the scene before her, she saw that the kids were having fun, and that's all that mattered.
Mikan smiled and said "that Bella is one strange serpent (serpent is non-derogatory naga slang for when they refer to each other), but as long as she is happy, so am I!"

         Madoka giggled and asked "where's Jeena?"
The two suddenly heard Jeena clear her throat and they saw her in a tree with her parachute caught in the branches. "just hanging around up there, am I right Jeena?"
Jeena sighed, obviously annoyed, and said "very funny, Madoka! Get me down from here! I'm getting dizzy!"
Then, Madoka slithered over to the tree and grabbed onto a rope on the branch that Jeena was stuck in. "Come on! Come on! I asked for help, so please help me!"
Then Mikan came over to her sister, giggled and said "okay, you asked for it!" the two yanked tightly on the rope and Jeena fell on the two. Jeena's head was in Mikan's bosom, so she had reason to blush. Mikan gasped in arousal as the pressure on her entire body increased. Jeena hugged Mikan in gratitude and then slithered over to Zuriella. Zuriella smirked after seeing her daughter's fall from grace and Jeena said "Sorry about that, mother. Had a bit of a rough landing."
Zuriella smiled, patted her daughter's head, and she said "at least you're back on the ground, Jeena. That's all that matters!" Mikan tells Madoka to head over to Zuriella and talk while she goes to hide the fifty-nine 'mice' she has left. As Madoka headed over to Zuriella, she expected to see a surprised look, but instead, Zuriella was expecting this and said "I have a feeling you want to embrace our friend, the king tonight. Am I right Madoka?"
Nodding in anticipation, Zuriella told the very eager Madoka some unexpected news.
She sighed and explained "I understand your love for the king, but unfortunately, last night my mind was... elsewhere. Because of Bella's bad dream last night, I wasn't able to truly embrace him. If I can have a second chance, I would give him my full attention and energy."
Madoka nodded, and Bella cutely said "Sorry about last night, Auntie Madoka!" Madoka giggled, ruffled Bella's head, hugged her and assured her it was alright, that things like that happen beyond anyone's control. Bella kissed Madoka's cheeks several times and played with her for two hours. After they were done, Mikan called Madoka over to tell her the game was ready. She headed into the main room and saw Shadow purring at her. Smiling, Madoka petted him said "Let's go get some yummy mice, pretty kitty!" Shadow meowed at her and the hunt was on (once more)!

choices: You and Madoka decide to have a little fun as well
124111112111211211111.content:
You watched the two hunting from a safe haven in the bookcase, and what you saw was astonishing. In a mere ten minutes, fifty-eight of the mice were caught and shared between Madoka and Shadow. Shadow was full after nine of them, and went to finding the others for Madoka. From what you remembered, you would only be this small for about eight hours (you were small for about six, as Mikan worked hard to hide them today), and for about one hour, Madoka petted Shadow, and played with him. As you watched, you suddenly saw another panther kitten (he was quite curious and very young; like born less than a week ago) looking at you. This began to frighten you, as it could draw unwanted attention if it meowed. You slowly moved for the kitten and it did the same to you. As you and the kitten got close to each other, you saw it was shaking in fear. Not wanting to scare the little kitten, you take your mouse hat off, place it on your side and whisper "it's okay. I'm not gonna hurt you." As you got close enough, you put your hand out to pet it, causing it to calm down. You rubbed the new kitten all over it's body, as it started to take a liking to you, so you whispered "good kitty!" And you played with the kitten for a half an hour (leaving you with three minutes before you grew back when you were done playing with it). Then you and the kitten looked at Shadow and Madoka and saw that Maddy's belly was a massive globe-like mound, you assumed it was from all the mice she ate. Madoka suddenly said "Just two more mice to go, but I'm so full! Well, I'll have just one more, and then I'll have fun with my cute little boy toy!" She was referring to you, and you then realized the other 'mouse' was out there somewhere.
Then, he suddenly came out from one of the shelves and tried to make a run for it. Shadow saw this and meowed at him. The 'mouse' froze in fear as he stood in between an energetic kitten and a naga with room for one more. Shadow pounced on the pirate, and carried him to Madoka in his little mouth, purring. Madoka stroked Shadow, and petted him, saying "Good boy!" before she slurped the guy down. Soon after, she let out a massive belch and said "Okay, darling! I see you up there, but you win! I'm too full to eat you up!" You figured out no place was safe for Madoka's prey, but smiled as she was teasing you. (you knew that she'd only eat you if you wanted her to or would let her) Then, you and your new kitty friend got down from the bookcase.

         Not a minute after you did, you grew back to normal size, and Shadow ran for you. He also saw the new kitten and purred at it. The new kitty was terrified, but did not run. As Shadow purred at the kitten, he felt an urge to play with it (as if it was another of his litter). Three minutes later, little Shadow started to act cute and the new kitty ran over to play. To make it short, they played like, well, kittens (what else?). You were laughing at how adorable this sight was when Madoka asked you to come to her. You saw her stomach bouncing all around with a big bulge from the fifty 'mice' fighting for their lives inside her gut. As you gently rub Madoka's massive, tender, violently-thrashing belly, she moaned in ecstasy from your touch and tickled your crotch with her tail. You know the routine, and kiss both her forehead and her stomach. Sweet Madoka giggled and asked "Darling, is it okay if Sonya's mom eats you again tonight? She never really got to hug you with her tummy last night, because of Bella's nightmare!"
You smiled and said "As long as you and Sonya are okay with it!"
Madoka smiled and replied "I'm okay with it! but is Sonya alright with her mom eating you again tonight?"
Sonya entered the room with Okonga and told you she heard it, saying "It's okay! I have this sweet, handsome, young man right here, tonight!"
She kissed Okonga gently on his cheek and neck, causing him to blush both spontaneously and uncontrollably. Sonya asked "Baby, is it okay if I love him too? Today was just wonderful with Okonga, and I wanna thank him like I'd thank you for a day like today." She tickled his crotch with her tail and finger, causing Okonga to become aroused. Laughing you shake your head, as to how cute they looked. Sonya was about to cry (she thought you were saying no). but you weren't done with your answer and you say "Sonya, you can love whoever you want! After all, you letting me love anyone I want just seems a little unfair if you're not allowed to do the same! You two look simply ADORABLE as a couple! As long as you're happy, I'm happy, too!" Sonya gasped in happiness before squealing in joy. Okonga collapsed at your words (from surprise, disbelief and excitement) and Sonya tackled you, kissing you several times, before she took Okonga into her room for a long round of sex.
Madoka, smiled at your words and said "Don't worry about me, darling! I only wanna love you! You're all I ever wanted in a man, and then some!" Kissing your body gently, Madoka giggles as you turn completely red (not just your face, your entire body this time).
